titles.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2777 Logan Avenue in San Diego, California, as the "Cesar E. Chavez Post Office".
To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2777 Logan Avenue in San Diego, California, as the "Cesar E. Chavez Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility (the Southeastern Post Office) located at 2777 Logan Avenue in San Diego, California, as the Cesar E. Chavez Post Office.
